00028 class Graph {
00029     public:
00030         // --------
00031         // typedefs
00032         // --------
00033 
00034         typedef unsigned long vertex_descriptor;
00035         typedef pair<vertex_descriptor, vertex_descriptor> edge_descriptor;
00036 
00037         typedef const vertex_descriptor* vertex_iterator;
00038         typedef const edge_descriptor* edge_iterator;
00039         typedef const vertex_descriptor* adjacency_iterator;
00040 
00041         typedef size_t vertices_size_type;
00042         typedef size_t edges_size_type;
00043 
00044     public:
00045         // --------
00046         // add_edge
00047         // --------
00048 
00054         friend pair<edge_descriptor, bool> add_edge (vertex_descriptor vone, vertex_descriptor vtwo, Graph& theGraph) {
00055             edge_descriptor thisEdge = make_pair(vone, vtwo);
00056             bool success = false;
00057             if(find(theGraph.g[vone].begin(), theGraph.g[vone].end(), vtwo) == theGraph.g[vone].end())
00058             {
00059                 theGraph.g[vone].push_back(vtwo);
00060                 theGraph.my_edges.push_back(thisEdge);
00061                 success = true;
00062             }
00063             return make_pair(thisEdge, success);}
00064 
00065         // ----------
00066         // add_vertex
00067         // ----------
00068 
00074         friend vertex_descriptor add_vertex (Graph& theGraph) {
00075             theGraph.g.push_back(vector<vertex_descriptor>());
00076             theGraph.my_vertices.push_back(theGraph.g.size() - 1);
00077             return theGraph.g.size() - 1;}
00078 
00079         // -----------------
00080         // adjacent_vertices
00081         // -----------------
00082 
00088         friend pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator> adjacent_vertices (vertex_descriptor v, const Graph& theGraph) {
00089             adjacency_iterator b = &*theGraph.g[v].begin();
00090             adjacency_iterator e = &*theGraph.g[v].end();
00091             return make_pair(b, e);}
00092 
00093         // ----
00094         // edge
00095         // ----
00096 
00102         friend pair<edge_descriptor, bool> edge (vertex_descriptor vone, vertex_descriptor vtwo, const Graph& theGraph) {
00103             edge_descriptor ed = make_pair(vone, vtwo);
00104             bool success = false;
00105             if(find(theGraph.g[vone].begin(), theGraph.g[vone].end(), vtwo) != theGraph.g[vone].end())
00106                 success = true;
00107             return make_pair(ed, success);}
00108 
00109         // -----
00110         // edges
00111         // -----
00112 
00119         friend pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator> edges (const Graph& theGraph) {
00120             return make_pair(&*theGraph.my_edges.begin(), &*theGraph.my_edges.end());}
00121 
00122         // ---------
00123         // num_edges
00124         // ---------
00125 
00130         friend edges_size_type num_edges (const Graph& theGraph) {
00131             return theGraph.my_edges.size();}
00132 
00133         // ------------
00134         // num_vertices
00135         // ------------
00136 
00141         friend vertices_size_type num_vertices (const Graph& theGraph) {
00142             return theGraph.my_vertices.size();}
00143 
00144         // ------
00145         // source
00146         // ------
00147 
00153         friend vertex_descriptor source (edge_descriptor ed, const Graph& theGraph) {
00154             return ed.first;}
00155 
00156         // ------
00157         // target
00158         // ------
00159 
00165         friend vertex_descriptor target (edge_descriptor ed, const Graph& theGraph) {
00166             return ed.second;}
00167 
00168         // ------
00169         // vertex
00170         // ------
00171 
00177         friend vertex_descriptor vertex (vertices_size_type vindex, const Graph& theGraph) {
00178             if(theGraph.my_vertices.size() == 0)
00179                 return 0;
00180             return theGraph.my_vertices[vindex];}
00181 
00182         // --------
00183         // vertices
00184         // --------
00185 
00190         friend pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator> vertices (const Graph& theGraph) {
00191             return make_pair(&*theGraph.my_vertices.begin(), &*theGraph.my_vertices.end());}
00192 
00193     private:
00194         // ----
00195         // data
00196         // ----
00197 
00198         vector< vector<vertex_descriptor> > g; //structure relating sources to their targets, and implicitly their edges
00199         vector<edge_descriptor> my_edges;      //list of all of the edge descriptors
00200         vector<vertex_descriptor> my_vertices; //list of all of the verticies
00201 
00202         // -----
00203         // valid
00204         // -----
00205 
00209         bool valid () const {
00210             if(my_edges.size() == 0 && my_vertices.size() == 0)
00211                 return true;
00212             for(int x = 0; x < (int)my_edges.size(); x++)
00213             {
00214                 if(!edge(my_edges[x].first, my_edges[x].second, *this).second)
00215                   return false;
00216             }
00217             return true;}
00218 
00219     public:
00220         // ------------
00221         // constructors
00222         // ------------
00223 
00227         Graph () {
00228             assert(valid());}

00233         // Graph& operator = (const Graph&);
00234     };
